howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Learn how to use the app and get the most out of it!

step1.title: Introduce Yourself
step1.description: Upload your photo or choose a ready-made model. The stage is yours to show your style!

step2.title: Describe Your Outfit
step2.description: A long red dress? An oversize shirt? Just describe it ‚Äî we'll dress you!

step3.title: Upload Image
step3.description: If you have a photo of an outfit or design you like, upload it. AI will apply it on you.

step4.title: Share Link
step4.description: Saw an outfit on an e-commerce site? Paste the link, we'll show it on you.

step5.title: See Yourself
step5.description: AI places the outfit on you. Discover how your style looks instantly!

step6.title: Add to Wardrobe
step6.description: Save your favorite looks, create combinations and build your own digital wardrobe.
